# App-GhaProve

[![MetaCPAN](https://img.shields.io/cpan/v/App-GhaProve.svg)](https://metacpan.org/release/App-GhaProve)
![Licence](https://img.shields.io/cpan/l/App-GhaProve)
[![Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/tobyink/p5-app-ghaprove)](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-app-ghaprove/issues)
[![CI](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-app-ghaprove/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-app-ghaprove/actions)
[![Coveralls](https://coveralls.io/repos/tobyink/p5-app-ghaprove/badge.svg?branch=master&amp;service=github)](https://coveralls.io/github/tobyink/p5-app-ghaprove)
[![Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/tobyink/p5-app-ghaprove/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/tobyink/p5-app-ghaprove)

Perl 5 distribution App-GhaProve; see [homepage](https://metacpan.org/release/App-GhaProve)
for downloads and documentation.

Directy installing from GitHub is not recommened; download the distribution
from the CPAN.

## Issues

Please report any issues via [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-app-ghaprove/issues).
